/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, viewed from a low angle. The street is teeming with vehicles of various types and colors, including cars, buses, and trucks. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of red and brown. The sky overhead is a blanket of gray, suggesting an overcast day. The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a low vantage point and looking up towards the towering buildings, it gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene.
